fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot someone with your flintlock, dealing a Basic attack.
- Fire your cannon at someone. If their defense is above None, deal an Overkill attack to them. Otherwise, does nothing. (3 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not fire your cannon two nights in a row.
- Your cannon is Astral.
- Defense granted by external sources, such as granted by Town (Protectives), counts as defense. Autovests will also count as defense.
- You keep your second ability if your role is changed for any reason.
